item.title: A Stargazers’ Guide to Watching the Full Moon Pass Mars and the a New Come
item.description: On Monday night you may have a chance to witness the moon obscuring the Red Planet at its brightest, as well as a comet’s closest approach to the sun.

item.title: The Pitched Battles for Partisan Control in State Legislatures
item.description: As state legislatures convene, they face the same political polarization seen in Congress. Some are in near-deadlock.

item.title: No One Should Be Scoring Political Points Over a Fire
item.description: It’s way too soon for ideological score-settling.

item.title: ‘Will Pay Any Amount’: Private Firefighters Are in Demand in L.A.
